data.question: What is the lethal dose IDLH concentration of nitric oxide?
What is the main advantage of using MOFs for gas delivery in organic reactions?
data.answer: MOFs can serve a dual role as a gas cargo vehicle and a catalyst, leading to product formation with yields similar to reactions employing pure gases.

Is the yield of thalidomide using CO@Mg2(DOBDC) practically identical to the one obtained with CO gas?
What is the role of water in the aromatization reaction using NO@Co2(DOBDC)?
data.answer: Water vapor can complete the release of coordinated NO molecules from the framework through water-to-nitric oxide exchange.

data.answer: Oxygen significantly accelerates the reaction and decreases the reaction time.
